Desc.entry: Comprises Youth Offending Service (YOS), mentoring and Appropriate Adult (AA) schemes. Trained mentors support young people (aged 8-17 years). Referral by Sheffield YOS or one of the two prevention teams attached to it. The Appropriate Adult Scheme trains volunteers to support vulnerable adults and juveniles being questioned by the police when the parents cannot attend. Company limited by guarantee no 3645143.
